body:
Just to let everyone know, we have decided to hold the Radiance workshop during the first week of September.  The dates will be Sept. 1-3, 2014, in London at the ARUP offices.  This is a week later than the original plan, and was moved by request from some of the organizers.


An official announcement with the website URL will follow shortly.


Cheers,
-Greg
___
